attributes.action: reorganise the payment of MP's electorate allowances to reflect actual workloads and casework instead of a flat allowance system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that all MPs receive electorate allowances on a flat rate system instead of being based on an actual workload or casework basis.

This means that some MPs with a low volume traffic / workload are getting subsidised by those MPs whose electorate office is very busy.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
